paragraphs: Hungarian low-cost airline Wizz Air will launch two new direct flights from Prague to the Romanian cities of Bucharest and Iași. This was announced on Thursday by the press service of Prague's Václav Havel Airport.
The carrier will start flying to Bucharest four times a week from October 26, 2025, and to Iasi twice a week from October 28.
The routes will be served by Airbus A321neo and A321ceo aircraft.
Tickets to Bucharest are already on sale. The cost of a one-way flight starts from 840 kroner.
